name: Recoiling Frame
desc:
This ship's frame is unusually lightweight, absorbing disproportionately high amounts of weapons fire with backwards movement. High tolerances allow over-clocking undersized weapons if adequate armament is unavailable.

Propels the ship opposite to the direction of %s weapons fire, based on their damage output. If a %s weapon is mounted, increases ballistic rate of fire and ammo regeneration for all weapons by %s.

If %s is installed, reduces backwards propulsion from weapons fire by %s.
short: Propels the ship backwards when firing medium and large weapons, based on the damage output and direction of fire. Increases ballistic rate of fire and ammo regeneration by 50% if a medium weapon is mounted instead of a large. Backwards propulsion is reduced by 20% if using heavy armor.

name: Linked Mounting Assemblies
desc:
The Serenade's mountings are streamlined for loading opposite pairs, allowing it to support considerably more heavy weaponry than its low-tech power core might suggest.

Reduces the ordnance point cost of large weapons by %s and medium weapons by %s. Every symmetrical pair of weapons increases flux dissipation, by %s for large weapons and %s for medium weapons.
short: Reduces OP for large and medium weapons by 10/5, and increases flux dissipation by 100/50 for every symmetrical pair of large/medium weapons mounted.

name: Hardpoint-Array Stabilizers
desc:
The Chorale's hardpoints are specialized for handling the sustained force of numerous heavy weapons against a relatively lightweight frame. This benefits shorter-ranged weapons, but doctrinal requirements limit the effectiveness of longer-ranged armaments.

Increases the range of non-PD medium/large weapons below %s base range by %s/%s, up to %s. Reduces top speed by %s su/second for every medium or large weapon with %s or more base range.
short: Increases the range of non-PD medium and large weapons below 800 base range by 200/100, up to 800. Reduces top speed by 3 for every medium or large weapon with 1000 or more base range.

name: Adjusted Hardpoint Array
desc:
Fixing the orientation of the Chorale's hardpoints has, on top of requiring a redesign of its signature system,  effectively reduced performance.

Reduces the ship's top speed by %s su/second and flux dissipation by %s.
short: Reduces the ship's top speed by 20 and flux dissipation by 100.

name: Converted Fuel Nacelle
desc: This ship's front fuel nacelle has been carved out to make room for a surprisingly functional fighter bay, at the expense of %s of its base fuel capacity.
short: Adds a single fighter bay, but halves the ship's base fuel capacity.

name: Integrated Point Defense AI
desc:
Gives all point-defense weapons the ability to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. In addition, all point-defense weapons get the best possible target leading, regardless of combat readiness, and all damage to missiles is increased by %s. 

On the Bastillon (EP), this hullmod is considered %s. All small non-missile weapons are classified as "point-defense", automatically target missiles, and are affected by point-defense stat modifiers.
short: Small non-missile weapons act as point-defense; PD not affected by decoy flares.

name: Integrated Point Defense AI
desc:
Gives all point-defense weapons the ability to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. In addition, all point-defense weapons get the best possible target leading, regardless of combat readiness, and all damage to missiles is increased by %s. 

On the Defender (EP), this hullmod is considered %s. All small non-missile weapons are classified as "point-defense", automatically target missiles, and are affected by point-defense stat modifiers. Additionally, the damage bonus applies to fighters as well.
short: Small non-missile weapons act as point-defense; PD not affected by decoy flares.

name: Pact Will
desc:
The prospect of life under constant threat gives Pact crew a certain proclivity not just to live on the edge, but to thrive in the face of the void itself.

Ships gain bonus ballistic and energy damage when over %s flux or under %s hull, scaling up to %s bonus damage for both independently at %s flux and %s hull.
short: Increases ballistic and energy damage dealt when over 70% flux or under 30% hull by 20/15/10/5% each, maxing out at 90% flux and 10% hull.
